entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 4:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
